sentence: I'm from Romania, but I can guess what can make kids happy when someone from US visits them: American Sweets by the bag (but not chocolates such as Hershey or Reese's), Sports caps and/or t-shirts (with cool drawings on them but maybe not with the American flag), toys (superheroes, transformers, toy soldiers, nerf guns), and for the adults American hats (not Stetson - something not expensive, but with that shape), multi-tool pliers, generic brand perfumes
